title: (08173) Barcelona - Avda. de les Roquetes
description: Park & Ride for 500 vehicles with a bus at the door direct to the center. The bus only runs from Monday to Friday except August. 15 minutes walk from the center.

title: (08173) Barcelona - 42 Carretera Rabassada
description: Place to spend the night in nature in peace.

title: (08173) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 1Z Ronda Nord
title_short: (08173) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 1Z Ronda Nord
description: A spacious parking lot close to the shops and the pharmacy. Has a significant slope.

title: (08195) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 31 Carrer Alfons el Magnànim
title_short: (08195) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 31 Carrer Alfons el Magnànim
description: Unregulated parking in a secure area, 10 minutes from the train station. Any secondary street in this area is suitable for overnight stays and is safe, ideal for visiting Barcelona.

title: (08173) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 2 Avinguda del Puig de Rimila
title_short: (08173) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 2 Avinguda del Puig de Rimila
description: Excellent parking in Turó de Can Matas. You can park the vehicle 24/7

title: (08197) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 3 Carrer Rosas
title_short: (08197) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 3 Carrer Rosas
description: There are lots of parking spaces in side streets, like this one, the train station is not far and you can get to downtown Barcelona by train in about 25 minutes. We didn't sleep here, but it shouldn't be a problem either

title: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 50 Carrer Mare de Déu del Roser
title_short: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 50 Carrer Mare de Déu del Roser
description: Clear, quiet parking, with supermarkets nearby, gas stations, water supply at 600m and level parking. Walking 3 minutes you reach the Volpelleres station and in 30 minutes by train you are in the heart of Barcelona

address.street: 50 Carrer Mare de Déu del Roser

title: (08197) Valldoreix - 11 Rambla Mossèn Jacint Verdaguer
description: Ground parking right next to the train stop. An area to get to Barcelona. In 20 minutes you are in the center. I have seen vans several times and it seems that there is no problem at the moment...

title: (08290) Cerdanyola del Vallès - Autopista del Mediterráneo
title_short: (08290) Cerdanyola del Vallès - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Parking area near gas station we spent a very quiet night. there are many truckers parked

title_short: (08197) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 39 Rambla Mossèn Jacint Verdaguer
description: Parking for vehicles less than 6mtrs, fair space, but flat. Nearby there are trails to visit the Sierra de Collserola.

title: (08290) Cerdanyola - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: The emptying and filling of water are just behind the Cepsa gas station

title: (08290) Cerdanyola del Vallès - B-30
description: Parking service station, with possibility of eliminating waste water.

title: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 29 Avinguda de l'Estació
title_short: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 29 Avinguda de l'Estació
description: Very convenient to get to central Barcelona by train in 15 minutes for 2.40 euros. Station 5 mins walk up the street, next to the café.

title: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Avinguda d'Europa
title_short: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Avinguda d'Europa
description: Parking for motorhomes not guarded very close to the Sant Cugat - Rubí exit of the AP7 motorway. Area to spend the night without any kind of service. Very close to the shopping center. 32 seats in battery plus 15 in line.

title: (08290) Cerdanyola del Vallès - BV-1415
description: Parking without picnic area, beginning of routes. Quiet zone.

title: (08290) -
description: Can Coll picnic area and barbecues (you have to pay at the bar to use the barbecue) pets are not allowed, it is in the Collserola park, next to the road that will take us directly to Barcelona 15 min

title: (08198) La Floresta - Carrer Moret
description: Drinking water point

title: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 13 Carrer Adrià Pardos
title_short: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 13 Carrer Adrià Pardos
description: Half-turn zone of residents, a lamppost but it's quiet and perfect for a night near Barcelona!

title: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Turó del Fumet
title_short: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Turó del Fumet
description:
Superb spot to sleep peacefully and safely.
Located at the end of a path (dead end) on the heights of the Park Collserola in the middle of a forest of oaks and pines. Flat area, easy access for camper or van without height limitation with the possibility of maneuvering and parking at night and day. This is the ideal place to visit Barcelona, just go down to the village of Floresta, located 2 km away with free parking and use the inter-quoted train (FGC) that drops you off in just 15 minutes. Catalonia (terminus) in the center of Barcelona and without change of train, ditto for the return!
Ideal both for discovering or going out on Barcelona which makes the availability of trains.

title: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 59 Avinguda Verge de Montserrat
title_short: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 59 Avinguda Verge de Montserrat
description: A place in La Floresta. Down a highway so there is a bit of traffic noise, but it is quiet at night. There is a supermarket and 2 bars 100 meters away. Les Escales restaurant is really good, great food and great atmosphere. It is also a bakery. Then in the opposite direction, a 10 minute walk to the train station and the main square, which has a nice Sunday market.

title: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 594 Avinguda de la Via Augusta
title_short: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 594 Avinguda de la Via Augusta
description: Parking x car near the mall, quiet day and night .... we had no problem.

title: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 3 Avinguda de la Via Augusta
title_short: (08174) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 3 Avinguda de la Via Augusta
description: Repsol station with LPG

title: (08290) Cerdanyola del Vallès -
description: Free parking near the train station. Calm on a Sunday night.

title: (08174) Cerdanyola del Vallès - Camí de Can Camps
title_short: (08174) Cerdanyola del Vallès - Camí de Can Camps
description: It's a dead-end street that passes by a couple of office buildings. It's fully parked during the day on working days, but totally empty at night and on weekends. The only problem might be teenagers parking their cars at the very end of the street and hiking a bit up to the mountain to drink alcohol and play music there on Friday or Saturday night.

title: (08174) Barcelona - Avinguda de la Generalitat
description: Public parking with long spaces, in a quiet and sunny area. very close to the center.

title: (08193) Cerdanyola del Vallès - Avinguda de Serragalliners
title_short: (08193) Cerdanyola del Vallès - Avinguda de Serragalliners
description: University parking lot, on a hill, surrounded by trees, silent firefighting station nearby, power lines overhead. Nice place, much space, although you can hear the motorway in the distance, not a problem. It close at night (9.20pm it was already closed)

title: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Camí de la Rabassada a Sant Medir
title_short: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Camí de la Rabassada a Sant Medir
description: Quiet night near Barcelona in a dead end. Straight and winding road. for the vans: ok. No service but a water point at the hermitage and picnic tables. 20min from the train station "Les Planes". Ideal for visiting Barcelona by public transport.

address.street: Camí de la Rabassada a Sant Medir

title: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 3 Camí de Can Fló
title_short: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 3 Camí de Can Fló
description: Parking in Collserola with views, quiet location and near Barcelona and a few km from Tibidabo

title: (08195) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 22 Carrer de Sabina Canyameras
title_short: (08195) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 22 Carrer de Sabina Canyameras
description: Simple parking for approximately 100 cars (almost empty on Sunday/Monday night).  It is on edge of city. Also good for long vehicles (7.5m).

title: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 303 Carrer Vallvidrera a Sant Cugat
title_short: (08198) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 303 Carrer Vallvidrera a Sant Cugat

title: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Camí de la Rabassada a Sant Medir
title_short: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Camí de la Rabassada a Sant Medir
description: Very calm place in full nature, possibility of spending the night for free

title: (08197) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 4 Carrer de Gabriel Ferrater
title_short: (08197) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 4 Carrer de Gabriel Ferrater
description: Quiet area where to spend the night. You can take a walk with your dog on a path. There are picnic tables. On Fridays and Saturdays, boys from the town go there with motorcycles

title: (08191) Rubí - 8 Carrer d'Hipatia
description: Public parking approximately 15 minutes from the center of Rubí and the train station in front of the Can Oriol park.

title: (08017) Barcelona - 103 Carrer Vallvidrera a Sant Cugat
title_short: (08017) Barcelona - 103 Carrer Vallvidrera a Sant Cugat
description: Right next to the train to Barcelona. One zone and you are in the center

title: (08017) Barcelona - 101 Carretera de Vallvidrera a les Planes
title_short: (08017) Barcelona - 101 Carretera de Vallvidrera a les Planes
description: Parking next to the station either on the road or behind the sports court. Bbq, picnic area, drinking water tap available behind the trees. Can be busy in the day with people but empty by night

address.street: 101 Carretera de Vallvidrera a les Planes

title: (08198) - 58 Barri Sant Medi
description: Quiet place, natural park, camping and night prohibited. Many stops on this road where you can park. No cars passing.

title: (08205) - 13 Carrer Autopista C-58
description: Exterior parking of the Ikea de Sabadell. Places are fair but as there is a sidewalk behind there is no problem.

title: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 28 Carrer Llentiscle
title_short: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - 28 Carrer Llentiscle
description: Nice place for those who want to visit Barcelona. Quiet, some cars start circulating around 07:00. No services nearby.

title: (08290) Cerdanyola del Vallès - 91 Passeig de Cordelles
title_short: (08290) Cerdanyola del Vallès - 91 Passeig de Cordelles
description: Place traveled day / night. Recommended for overnight on the road. Shopping center nearby. Drinking water source in the park less than 100m.

title: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08196) Sant Cugat del Vallès - Unnamed Road
description: Very tight spot for 1 4x4, small patch out of the way and off the road, under a large pylon (it's silent) ideal for a last minute stop.

title: (08191) Rubí - 231 Carretera Molins de Rei
description: Paid truck parking space with security day and night and barrier. On request, we were allowed to stay there overnight with our van (Fiat Ducato) for a fee  and use the very clean and modern sanitary facilities (shower and toilet). A nice little bar/bistro with very good breakfast and food is also on the premises. It's a bit noisy in the morning because the parking lot is right next to a road. A safe option for a visit to Barcelona, as there is a high level of security throughout the site.

title: (08197) Valldoreix - 76B Avinguda de Can Monmany
description: Parking next to the road. In front there is a mountain area with mountain routes.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 230I Carretera de l' Arrabassada
description: Quiet, nice and shady. next to a shelter.

title: (08035) Barcelona -
description: Surrounded by nature, drinking water

title: (08750) Molins de Rei - 1B Carrer Pont
description: Shaded level ground parking. Hiking trails start from here.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 97 Camí de Sant Cugat
description: Drinking water point at the start of the hiking trail

title: (08290) Cerdanyola del Vallès - Av. de Canaletes
title_short: (08290) Cerdanyola del Vallès - Av. de Canaletes
description: Space with a few tables to eat 2 minutes walk from the road. Peaceful place. From Friday to Monday you can park on the nearest avenue.

title: (08210) Barberà del Vallès - 92 Passeig del Doctor Moragas
title_short: (08210) Barberà del Vallès - 92 Passeig del Doctor Moragas
description: Parking near the Local Police, in a very quiet area. To spend the night, without services

title: (08035) Barcelona - Camí de Can Borni
description: Super quiet place and unique views, flat. Surrounded by nature. By day they park to go to Tibidabo. To the side there is also a private parking. . Site for 10 motorhomes there is water at 600metros

title: (08035) Barcelona - Carretera BV-1415 (carretera de Horta a Cerdanyola)
title_short: (08035) Barcelona - Carretera BV-1415 (carretera de Horta a Cerdanyola)
description: Known as Montbau viewpoint, it is an area to rest with plenty of tables and good views of Barcelona. There is no water (as far as I know). It is accessed from the road easily visible. Plenty of room to park and easy to maneuver. The parking there is a bit of shade

address.street: Carretera BV-1415 (carretera de Horta a Cerdanyola)

title: (08035) Barcelona - 47 Carretera de Vallvidrera al Tibidabo
title_short: (08035) Barcelona - 47 Carretera de Vallvidrera al Tibidabo
description: Several car parks along the road, slightly sloping, it is on the left while going up, towards the middle you will have the unobstructed view on Barcelona. Quiet place with some car passages. There is a lot of passage during the day, risk of low flight. Nearest parking to visit the Temple of the Sacred Heart of Jesus

title: (08017) Barcelona - Carretera de l'Església
description: Small dirt parking lot a 2 km hike from Tibidabo. Next to the road so some noise but otherwise surrounded by trees. Spotty phone signal. Didn’t spend the night but saw no signs against it.

title: (08191) Rubí - 8 Carrer del Gimnàs
description: Municipal parking

title: (08017) Barcelona - 1 Carretera de Vallvidrera a les Planes
title_short: (08017) Barcelona - 1 Carretera de Vallvidrera a les Planes
description: water fountain

address.street: 1 Carretera de Vallvidrera a les Planes

title: (08017) Barcelona - 11 Camí de la Llenega
description: Simple parking for cars, quiet and close to the station, convenient for reaching the city center.

title: (08191) Rubí - 38 Avinguda Castellbisbal
description: Quiet parking. Transport 10min walk to the center of Barcelona. No service but supermarket opposite open until 22h

title: (08210) Barberà del Vallès - Passatge Sagrera
description: Baricentro Shopping Center Parking to park during the day and buy and spend the night in peace. Place to sleep peacefully and vigilantly hanging around. Pharmacy has 24 hours and Mc Donalds 24 hotas on Fridays and Saturdays. There is no height limit next to Mc Donalds.

title: (08017) Barcelona - Carrer dels Reis Catolics
description: Parking in front of a natural park. Sloping but very quiet .. few cars that reach the bins nearby. metro to Barcelona 10 minutes walk through the natural park. the stop is baixador de vallvidrera. the metro in about 15 minutes arrives in the center of Barcelona.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 10I Vial Camino
description: Good parking spot for day and night on dead end street. Playground for kids and watertaps within 3min walk.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 47 Camí de Vallvidrera al Tibidabo
title_short: (08035) Barcelona - 47 Camí de Vallvidrera al Tibidabo
description: Parking Tibadobo paying, easily accessible only for the visit. No other parking possible even for cars.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 117 Carretera Horta a Cerdanyola
description: Orchard viewpoint. Something closer than the following and in my opinion with better views. In Covidien times at 10pm there was no one but when I arrived I found several cars with youth partying.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 20 Avinguda del Jordà
description: A good place for parking. No green zone marking. Drinking water available.  Metro 5min.

title: (08017) Barcelona - 25B Camí del Pantà
description: Large parking near houses and next to the lake. Quiet, small bar next door. Water point at the bottom of the tank. Narrow access for car and van, one lane, difficult crossing.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 44 Plaça del Cementiri d'Horta
description: Cemetery parking, very quiet and safe, during the day it is busy having the funeral home next door.

title: (08017) Barcelona -
description: Drinking water point

title: (08210) Barberà del Vallès - 9 Carrer de Monturiol
title_short: (08210) Barberà del Vallès - 9 Carrer de Monturiol
description: Repsol gas station with laundry, gas (I think only light model) and washers / dryers.

title: (08291) Ripollet - 16 Avinguda del Mediterrani
description: Large esplanade of land. It has no service. Very little shade. Quiet area where once a truck parks. In front there is a large park to walk around with drinking fountains and benches to sit on. A place to spend a night if necessary or make a stopover. The green area is huge for walking with the dogs. In the park there is a barbecue area and a bar for refreshments. You can't go on the last weekend of August because they hold the town's biggest festival and close the area and prohibit driving through the streets near the car park.

title: (08750) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - Carretera del Sanson
title_short: (08750) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - Carretera del Sanson
description:
Parking, at night it is quiet. During the day people come to use the picnic tables.
There is also a restaurant.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 9 Carrer de la Granja Vella
title_short: (08035) Barcelona - 9 Carrer de la Granja Vella
description: Free paved parking

title: (08754) El Papiol - 80 Carrer de les Escletxes
title_short: (08754) El Papiol - 80 Carrer de les Escletxes
description: We have recently opened a car park in El Papiol (15 minutes from Barcelona). You can leave the motorhome parked for days. We have the license of the council for the boarding of caravans, motorhomes and trailers, and that we have both outdoor and indoor parking spaces. We have more than 40,000 meters outside and more than 7000 meters for covered places. We have security cameras throughout the premises and alarms. Ideal place to park the caravan or motorhome. Very quiet area.

title: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 12 Carrer del Llaurador
title_short: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 12 Carrer del Llaurador
description: Dirt parking in front of a brasserie restaurant where cars are parked to walk and play with the dogs, next to the stream, picnic area, skate park.

title: (08204) Sabadell - 76 Passeig d'Espronceda
description: Laundry: washing machine (19kg, 14kg, 9kg) and dryer (19kg)

title: (08035) Barcelona - 77X Carrer de Bellesguard
description: At the end of a dead end street lies an open piece of ground. Some old cars are parked here but otherwise there is nothing. People from nearby appartments walk their dogs or do short hikes. There’s a monastery nearby (not visited). Very quiet for a place in a big city. No water, no power. There’s place for two or three RVs. Bus stop at 100m.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 12 Carrer de Coll i Alentorn
title_short: (08035) Barcelona - 12 Carrer de Coll i Alentorn
description: Free parking on gravel field. Right next to a soccer field. Approximately 30 min walk to Park Güell. Metro station nearby. Easy access to the city. No service, only parking.

title: (08960) Barcelona -
description: Esplanade in the middle of the Collserola Natural Park. During the day, park a car for people who are going to walk on the mountain, at night completely empty. There is no sign prohibiting the night. From the car park you can enter the Collserola mountain, several kilometers to cover on foot or by car. Nearby is the Vallvidrera reservoir.

title: (08035) Barcelona - 8 Carrer Juan de Ávila
description: Free parking with views of Barcelona

title: (08035) Barcelona - 11 Carrer de Carles Riba
description: We slept here for one night in Barcelona, we don't know if it's really safe but everything was fine. A security guy also came by and asked us if everything was ok. I think it went well because in the city it is not safe to sleep in a van.

title: (08960) Barcelona - BV-1468
description: Parking at a point of view, quiet in the day and shaded.

title: (08291) Ripollet - 90 Carrer del Padró
description: Parking at the end of town, in front of an open field, possibility of parking on asphalt or ground clearing. Very quiet and lots of light during the day. Streetlight lighting at night. You have the mountain in front, good views and possibility of entering the field that communicates with Montcada-Ripollet and if you walk you arrive at La Llagosta.

title: (08042) Barcelona - Ronda de la Guineueta Vella, 59
title_short: (08042) Barcelona - Ronda de la Guineueta Vella, 59
description:
Here we found 3 parkings. Better to use the 1. Quite flat and asphalted. A lot of car movement! A neighbor parks his car years ago and told me there are no problems. The entrance is easy. The Canyelles L3 metro is 10 minutes away.
Recall that motorhomes are prohibited in Barcelona
No shade, no services

title: (08210) Barberà del Vallès - Carrer Verneda
description: It is an area of orchards that is crossed by a river, there is a small picnic area and at night there is a good area for animals to spend the night. Sometimes they make a bottle. Free

title: (08754) El Papiol - 3 Cami Can Esteve
description: 20 minutes by train to the very center of Barcelona, with trains every 15 minutes, excursions to the escletxes del papiol and many hiking trails at the foot of the collserola (lung of barcelona). Supermarkets in town, charter, condis, and many bars. Very friendly and homely people. A small town anchored in time, twenty minutes from the center of Barcelona.

title: (08023) Barcelona - 19 Carrer de Ticià
description: Parking along the road in the neighborhood near the hospital, free on weekends! Quiet and close to Guell Park.

title: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 12 Ronda d'Arraona
title_short: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 12 Ronda d'Arraona
description: Land parking used by neighbors, but ACs are also parked there. It is centrally located and is very close to a park for walking and a Repsol gas station. It is also close to different shops.

title: (08205) Sabadell - 52 Carrer Domènech i Montaner
description: Car wash with pressure hose and 1 meter high walkway to reach the ceiling, not very high, but better than nothing!

title: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - Av. Can Pallàs
title_short: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - Av. Can Pallàs
description: Quiet place to sleep. There is always some AC, a safe place, surrounded by houses and buildings, plus a pizzeria right next door...

title: (08035) Barcelona - 301 Carretera de les Aigües
description: Mirador de Sarrià. Parking at the foot of the road in which to observe the beautiful views of the city of Barcelona, ​​above all night.

title: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 71 Ronda de Santa Julita
title_short: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 71 Ronda de Santa Julita
description: Ground parking. Next to a sports complex and a gas station and about 600 meters from the town center. Ahead is the local police. Easy to park for a 7.5m motorhome.

title: (08022) Barcelona - 26 Carrer dels Dominics
description: Streets around the CosmoCauxa Museum: 2h max parking, free at weekends. The museum is free for children up to 16 years old and for everyone else it costs. Very interactive and varied, large park freely accessible during opening hours with toilets, drinking water and cafeteria and some experiments. Free-flying green parrots in the quarter, many by the trees at the small playground.

title: (08017) Barcelona - 3 Carrer Pins de Can Caralleu
title_short: (08017) Barcelona - 3 Carrer Pins de Can Caralleu
description: Parking spaces to stay overnight. Do not climb with large caravans, there are many trails.

title: (08042) Barcelona - 326 Carretera Alta de les Roquetes
title_short: (08042) Barcelona - 326 Carretera Alta de les Roquetes
description: Sand parking with entry in the bend. Magnificent view of all Barcelona from above, opportunities for walks in the hills. Ideal to be quiet at night during a stay in Barcelona. No water, but there are plenty of fountains in the city. Be careful when traveling in the city, the pound is almost immediate for the French who do not pay the parking meter.

title: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 9507 Carrer del Moianès
title_short: (08192) Sant Quirze del Vallès - 9507 Carrer del Moianès
description: Parking near the cemetery, quiet ideal for a stop; supermarket at 1 km; shady; near center and assembly hall.

title: (08023) Barcelona - 7B Carrer del Portell
description: Small parking lot very quiet at night, close to a gym for the neighborhood. right next to park guell. Sloping entrance difficult access, only suitable for vans.

title: (08110) Montcada i Reixac - 4 Avinguda d'Europa
description: Not very busy street parking. It is next to the lake park which has a lot of areas to walk around. you sleep well and there are bakeries and supermarkets relatively close by. in the park there are several sources that serve to catch water in carafes.

title: (08203) Sabadell - 190 Camí Can Quadres
description: Sabadell covered track, parking area, quiet with municipal swimming pool, fountain.

title: (08042) Barcelona - 1X Carrer de les Torres
description: Parking near trinitat nova Station that takes you straight into the city centre in roughly 25minutes. Very busy and car spaces are close together. Be cautious of this. I advice arriving in the morning before the masses arrive

title: (08017) Barcelona - 21X Carrer de Gaspar Cassadó
description: Regular car parking next to a school, free parking here. Doable for vans

title: (08024) Barcelona - 106 Avinguda del Coll del Portell
title_short: (08024) Barcelona - 106 Avinguda del Coll del Portell
description: Great place with a great view of Tibidabo, great to spend the night in a van or van. Motorhomes are not suitable as this is a dead end street, there is no turning range.

title: (08110) Montcada i Reixac - 12 Carrer Verdi
description: Quiet street near the Mercadona

title: (08110) Moncada y Reixach - Nº 12 Carrer Verdi
title_short: (08110) Moncada y Reixach - Nº 12 Carrer Verdi
description: Launderette, very handy if you're parking behind the Montcada-ripollet train station. Its in the shopping precinct with cinema, gym and supermarket.

title: (08750) Molins de Rei - 9999 Camí Can Grané
title_short: (08750) Molins de Rei - 9999 Camí Can Grané
description: Free day parking in the middle of nature with capacity for about 40 vehicles, with several paths for walking and cycling. Picnic area with tables (no barbecue). Ruined monument as a point of interest.

title: (08228) Les Fonts - 31 Carrer de Caterina Albert
title_short: (08228) Les Fonts - 31 Carrer de Caterina Albert
description: Level public car park, next to Les Font station. Quiet at night.

title: (08228) Les Fonts - 6 Passeig Muntanya
description: Parking near les font station with shade. Gravel floor, practically level. There are 2 parking areas. Be careful if the gps leads you through a 2.7 tunnel there is another access above the roads if you come from Rubí.

title: (08110) Montcada i Reixac - 3-5 Carrer Marià Fortuny
title_short: (08110) Montcada i Reixac - 3-5 Carrer Marià Fortuny
description: Free parking in renfe station to 5 stops of catalonia square (20 min) residential and quiet area 3 minutes walk to mercadona, cinema and restaurant Vienna.

title: (08754) El Papiol - C-1413a
description: Parking at the El Papiol train station. station bar open from Monday to Friday from 6 in the morning to 10 at night, 20 minutes by train to the very center of Barcelona, with trains every 15 minutes, excursions to the escletxes del papiol and many hiking trails on foot from Collserola (lung of Barcelona). Supermarkets in town, charter, condis, and many bars. Very friendly and homely people. A small town anchored in time, twenty minutes from the center of Barcelona.

title: (08110) Montcada i Reixac - 6 Carrer Lleida
description: LA COLADA self-service laundry. Very clean and spacious space, 5 washers and 3 dryers. Seats to sit, table to fold and basket to transport clothes. It has a money exchange machine since the machines work with coins. Trash cans and air conditioning in summer, a very positive point. There is plenty of parking nearby under the freeway with no height limit. Right in front there are garbage containers. In the immediate vicinity there is a fountain, bakeries, supermarkets and parks.

title: (08110) Montcada i Reixac - 79 Carrer Baix de Sant Pere
title_short: (08110) Montcada i Reixac - 79 Carrer Baix de Sant Pere

title_short: (08110) Montcada i Reixac - 10 Carrer Marià Fortuny

title_short: (08750) Molins de Rei - 18 Carrer de Ramon Llull
description: Parking space for empty industrial halls, just outside the center. Traffic noises in the background but not disturbing. Have slept peacefully here.

title_short: (08960) Esplugues de Llobregat - Plaça de Mireia
description: Picnic area with a beautiful view. Drinking water fountain behind the café. Hiking trail with a city view. To be recommended as a place to sleep. Flat parking spaces available in the roundabout. Police drove past at night but left us in peace.

title: (08034) Barcelona - 16 Carrer de Castellet
description: Parking near Pedralbes monastery

title: (08205) Sabadell - 50 Carrer Regne Unit
description: Park area of ​​Can Gambus. Asphalted parking near the highway. With water from sources and quiet area. Lawn and tranquility. Without height limits. It is not a bad area to spend the night.

title: (08750) Molins de Rei - 15 Carrer de les Sínies
title_short: (08750) Molins de Rei - 15 Carrer de les Sínies
description: Parking where you can spend the night. I've slept there 4 times without any problems. At night it is quiet. At the end of the parking lot, a path leads to the river, where you can take a nice walk.

title: (08228) Terrassa - 17 C-58
description: It is a gas station where you can load water. The price is 1 euro for 5 minutes but a good stream comes out and we have filled the 90 L tank for 1 euro.

title: (08030) Barcelona - 149 Passeig de Torras i Bages
title_short: (08030) Barcelona - 149 Passeig de Torras i Bages
description: Parking near a metro station. Seems safe during the day.

title: (08130) Santiga - Unnamed Road
description:
Lovely parking lot surrounded by trees and shade. Perfect to spend a night if you pass through here.
Quiet place next to a church.

title: (08202) Sabadell - 73 Carrer de Bonavista
description: Land parking in front of the UAB Sabadell campus. There are containers and wifi from the university a few meters away, it can be accessed as a guest. Trafficked in the mornings by people walking dogs. There is a bakery right in front but it has no wifi.

title: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 100 Riera de la Salut
title_short: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 100 Riera de la Salut
description: At night it is quiet. For the day, yes, it's a good day, it fills up to burst due to the Restaurant and BBQ area there are.

title: (08206) Sabadell - 1 Carrer de Can Julià Ferrer
title_short: (08206) Sabadell - 1 Carrer de Can Julià Ferrer
description: drinking fountain

title: (08110) Moncada y Reixach - C-33
description: Good and quiet place to sleep not far from the city center. It is a very clean and quiet galp gas station at night. Today I have a trailer next to me and a large truck. Very large parking for any size.

title: (08202) Sabadell - 30 Diseminado del Ripoll Riu
description: Secluded parking area, with a river 1 minute walk, very quiet and secluded area

title: (08130) Santa Perpètua de Mogoda - Autopista del Mediterráneo
title_short: (08130) Santa Perpètua de Mogoda - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Gas station with cafeteria/pastries and Burger King. There are toilets (free) 24 hours a day, showers  from 7:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m., garbage containers, an area for emptying gray and black water and a fountain for filling clean water. In total there are about 35 or 40 parking spaces. You can perfectly spend the night.

title: (08206) Sabadell - 100 Carrer Prat de la Riba
title_short: (08206) Sabadell - 100 Carrer Prat de la Riba
description: Very spacious park side parking with picnic tables nearby

title: (08780) Pallejà - 597 N-2
description: Ample asphalt parking at the Repsol gas station next to the N-II. There is a restaurant that is open until noon. Between the gas station and the restaurant there is a fountain where you can fill up with clean water. It is a tap without a thread, so you have to use a pressure adapter.

title: (08755) Castellbisbal - 9 Avinguda de Sant Vicenç
description: Pebble car park at the top of the village, without any service. From here you can see Collserola and Tibidabo Park. Without any shade. Parking for local residents for small and medium-sized vans.

title: (08130) Santa Perpètua de Mogoda - Area de Servicio El Vallés
title_short: (08130) Santa Perpètua de Mogoda - Area de Servicio El Vallés
description: A gas station with a shower.

title: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 78 Carretera Sansón
title_short: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 78 Carretera Sansón
description:
Drinking water, gas station, pressure cleaning and vacuum cleaner.

Collserola Natural Park. Many tracks and trails for trekking and mountain biking

title: (08206) Sabadell - Avinguda d'Andreu Nin
description: Street at the back of Parque Cataluña, with many places where trailers, buses, etc. are used to parking. A ten minute walk are the public toilets of the park itself (although they have opening hours). It is a place with an average influx of vehicles.

title: (08755) Castellbisbal - 109 Carrer Major
description: Cemetery parking, with a little shade. A quiet place.

title: (08960) Sant Just Desvern - 6-8 Camí Riera Pahissa
title_short: (08960) Sant Just Desvern - 6-8 Camí Riera Pahissa
description: An explanation in a quiet area

title: (08780) Pallejà - Camí de Roca d’Adroc
description: Large dirt car park without services next to the Pallejà cemetery. Suitable for any vehicle. Fairly flat and with some shaded areas. It is out of town but not far. It is reached by paved road. It is surrounded by nature and is a good starting point for excursions to the mountains or visit the Font de les Rovires waterfalls in just 15 minutes. It is a quiet place, although it is close to the train tracks and highways, so during the day there is some noise. It does not have services but it does have garbage containers. It is an ideal place to stop. I have confirmed by calling the local police that AC and camper can park here.

title: (08924) Santa Coloma de Gramenet - 36 Carrer Girona
title_short: (08924) Santa Coloma de Gramenet - 36 Carrer Girona
description: Open ground where you can park.

title: (08041) Barcelona - 71X Carrer del Mas Casanovas
description: Paid parking.

title: (08755) Castellbisbal - Autopista del Mediterráneo
description: Motorway area

title: (08780) Pallejà -
description: Large dirt and grass car park without services next to the forest between the institute and the Pallejà cemetery. Suitable for any vehicle. Fairly flat and with some shaded areas. It is out of town but not far. It is reached by paved road. There are higher places for those who dare or have a 4x4. It is surrounded by nature and is a good starting point for excursions to the mountains or visiting Pallejà or the Font de les Rovires waterfalls in just 15 minutes. It is a quiet place, although it is close to the train tracks and highways, so during the day there is some noise. I have confirmed by calling the local police that AC and camper can park here.

title: (08755) Castellbisbal - 3 Carrer Font del Cabrer
description: It is a very quiet Parking there are few vehicles it has electricity and in front of an area with houses, I have spent a very quiet night.

title: (08755) Castellbisbal - 24 Carrer de l'Estació
description: Parking in 3 levels. In the 2nd level hem aparcat l'ac.

title: (08780) Pallejà - Unnamed Road
description: Wonderful open space amongst the trees. Great tracks throughout the mountain for those wanting to explore, and loads of other little spots to place yourself. We found this to be the best as we could get solar most of the day despite being surrounded by trees.

title: (08206) Sabadell - unnamed road
description: Supermarket, public transport, public park. Near the city center.

title: (08950) Esplugues de Llobregat - 10 Carrer Josep Anguera i Sala
title_short: (08950) Esplugues de Llobregat - 10 Carrer Josep Anguera i Sala
description: Vacant lot on the heights of Barcelona (pedralbes district) with a flat part where it is possible to sleep. it is free parking (except paying blue zone). No indication or prohibition. we stayed there for 2 days and 2 nights to visit Barcelona. It is not very pretty (some use it as a dumping ground) but there is a view over Barcelona and it is especially convenient because you can go to the city center from there by public transport. Parking is outside the low CO2 emission zone, so also convenient for older vehicles that are not allowed to enter the city. Please be discreet (do not leave the table or other) otherwise the neighbors will complain.

title: (08030) Barcelona - 46 Carrer de Ferran Junoy
description: Day parking in a free shopping center. Torres i bages metro nearby. Open from 08:30 to 00:30.

title: (08208) Sabadell - 8 Plaça del Taulí
description: Parking in small garden. Good situation Very calm. With shadow. Very central. I arrived on a Saturday at 10 pm there were plenty of places to park

title: (08780) Pallejà - 37 Ronda de Santa Eulàlia
description: Parking area next to the Bonpreu supermarket, 5 minutes on foot from the town center and 1 minute from the A2 motorway. Near the gas station. It is an area where you can usually find parking for any type of vehicle. It is next to a promenade full of bars and restaurants where you can eat or have breakfast. There are green areas to walk the dog, a skate area, ping-pong, a water fountain and benches to sit on. Ideal to make a stop and buy at the supermarket or go to eat nearby, or visit the town center.

title: (08780) Pallejà -
description: Wide esplanade in the middle of the forest. It is located next to the path that goes to the Font de les Rovires and the Pallejà mountains. There are enough places to park although they are not completely flat. Sunny place much of the day. It is accessed from the cemetery by a dirt road. At the beginning it has a slight slope, some ruts and some stones, but later it is flat and wide, very easy to drive with large vehicles. Area frequented by hikers.

title: (08030) Barcelona - Carrer de Potosí
description: Large free car park. Very close to public toilets (in the gas station / Carrefour). Close to Metro stop Torres i Bages which goes directly to Arc de Triomf. No place to shower (unless you have one in your van/solar shower). WiFi in the shopping plaza opposite the carpark can be picked up from the spaces closest to the road.

title: (08960) Sant Just Desvern - 16 Carrer de Rosa Luxemburg
title_short: (08960) Sant Just Desvern - 16 Carrer de Rosa Luxemburg
description: Well leveled parking area. Next to a park with playgrounds, tables and a fountain. In the same street there is a bakery, a restaurant with a cheap daily menu and an ice cream parlor with delicious ice creams. In the same street, a bus that takes you to Barcelona in 25 minutes or a train that connects with the metro in a 12-minute walk.

title: (08780) Pallejà - 39 Carrer Joan Molins Parera
description: Parking on the municipal market in the center of town. It is accessed by ramp to the roof. Suitable for vans of any size, but AC and trucks it is better not to enter even if it is not signposted. In the market we find several food stalls, two bars, a large Mercadona supermarket, and other shops. There are public restrooms and rubbish bins.

title: (08780) Pallejà - Unnamed road
description: Parking of the railway station in the center of town. Next to the Mercadona supermarket and the municipal market. There are bars and restaurants nearby. Ideal for buying food, visiting the town or taking the trains to Barcelona, Montserrat or other destinations

title: (08924) Santa Coloma de Gramenet - Carrer de Menorca
title_short: (08924) Santa Coloma de Gramenet - Carrer de Menorca
description: Nice little parking lot overlooking Barcelona/Badalona. Next door, little-used one-way street.

title: (08130) Santa Perpètua de Mogoda - 5 Passeig de Can Taió
title_short: (08130) Santa Perpètua de Mogoda - 5 Passeig de Can Taió
description: Parking quiet area, bike lane and very cool park, I have slept and nobody has told me, there are several bars nearby, there is also a supermarket in the street behind, it is a quiet residential area, so you have to take care not to dirtying or putting up mess since the neighbors would call the authorities. Relatively close to the AP-7 motorway, a good area to rest before visiting Barcelona. There is a fountain nearby. I emphasize respect for the environment and the neighbors.

title: (08037) Barcelona - 228 Carrer de Bailèn
description: Secured underground parking.  3.30 an hour. height 2m20. Bathroom. 20 minutes from Parc Guell. 20 minutes sagrada family. 40 minutes cathedral.

title: (08780) Pallejà - 136 Avinguda Prat de la Riba
title_short: (08780) Pallejà - 136 Avinguda Prat de la Riba
description: Self-service laundry on the main road. You can park nearby without problems.

title: (08780) Pallejà - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful escape underneath the trees near the top of the hill. Cut out next to the lane is reasonably flat. You could comfortably fit a few 4x4 vehicles here. Wonderful views!!

title: (08780) Pallejà -
description: Grassy esplanade in the middle of the forest away from the main road. There are plenty of flat, shaded parking spaces. It is located next to the path that goes to the Font de les Rovires and the Pallejà mountains. It is accessed from the cemetery by a dirt road. At the beginning it has a slight slope, some ruts and some stones, but later it is flat and wide, very easy to drive with large vehicles. Area frequented by hikers.

title: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 51 Passeig Rafael de Casanova
title_short: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 51 Passeig Rafael de Casanova
description: gravel parking lot

title: (08028) Barcelona - 7 Carrer de Martí i Franquès
title_short: (08028) Barcelona - 7 Carrer de Martí i Franquès
description: Free parking on the street. We moved a little bit up and down the same street. Best time to get a spot was before 6am and after 10pm. There is a cctv on the nearest building (university), parks, benches and trashcans nearby. No problems for us, not really noisy. Tube is really close (top corner of the street) and it takes around 25 mins to the center.

title: (08041) Barcelona - 114 Carrer de Trinxant
description: Secure car park. You can find them on google maps by Motorhome parking in Barcelona. When we arrived at the gates, the security guard showed us our parking space and gave us a ticket. We visited the city (8 min walk to Navas metro station) and returned in 6 hours. Worth it as all the parking and guards make you feel safe for your van/RV. 2.9m height max.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 695 Avinguda Diagonal
description: Large parking lot next to the diagonal. Quiet night (traffic noise). Little free in the region.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 22 Carrer de Pau Gargallo
description: Large parking lot near the Camp Nou and the Royal Palace metro station. It seems that you can not park if there is a game.

title: (08780) Pallejà -
description: Parking at the entrance to the font de les rovires from the bottom. In the middle of the forest. there are some almost flat spaces to park and with shade. It is at the end of a dead end road. if there are more vehicles it can be difficult to maneuver to turn around, so it is advisable to park facing the exit of the road. It is accessed from the cemetery by a dirt road. At the beginning it has a slight slope, some ruts and some stones, but later it is flat and wide, very easy to drive with large vehicles. In the last section there is a slope and a curve to the left. Then it is to follow the path one more minute to the end. area frequented by hikers.

title: (08960) Sant Just Desvern - 43 Passeig de Can Sagrera
title_short: (08960) Sant Just Desvern - 43 Passeig de Can Sagrera
description: Car wash but with one for motorhomes.

title: (08020) Barcelona - 184 Passeig de la Verneda
description: Parking where you can leave the car during the day and night. There is no surveillance, a lot of sun.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 643 Avinguda Diagonal
description: Close to football stadium Barcelona.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 8 Carrer de la Torre Melina
title_short: (08028) Barcelona - 8 Carrer de la Torre Melina
description: Wide place and near the L3 metro to go to the city center. We stayed there for 2 nights rather quiet and without problems.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 8 Carrer d’Adolf Florensa
description: Small earthen car park between the buildings. Possible in motorhome

title: (08036) Barcelona - 176 Carrer de Paris
description: Parking garage for tall vehicles

title: (08780) Pallejà - Camí de Can Coll
description: Dirt parking next to the access to the Font de les Rovires and the waterfalls. One of the best and most isolated rural areas near Pallejà. It is reached by the road that goes up to the institute, then turns into a dirt road that narrows in some places. There are areas where there is only room for one vehicle and areas with a slope. Be careful as there are parts of the road that are not easy with large vehicles, but it is worth going. At Font de les Rovires there is a natural water spring, waterfalls and a picnic table in a beautiful natural setting.

title: (08120) La Llagosta - 30 Carrer de l'Estació
description: Magnificent place for day and night, ideal for visiting Barcelona, train station 50 meters away. Very safe place.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 20U Carrer d'Arístides Maillol
description: Busy car park next to sports fields, close to Camp Nou and the university. During the day many tourists, (parents of) athletes and students pass through. In the evening it gets quieter (and grittier). No parking during FC Barcelona matches.

title: (08028) Barcelona - 9 Avinguda d'Albert Bastardas
description: Parking to visit the city of Barcelona and especially 10 minutes walk from Camp Nou to see a football match, stay only one night, in the morning a little too much car passage

title: (08027) Barcelona - 11 Baixada de la Sagrera
description: Parking in the neighborhood of Sagrera, shops and public transport nearby, during the day has a lot of activity the night is quieter, ideal to visit Barcelona

title: (08780) Pallejà -
description: Stone car park next to the road between Pallejà and the Fontpineda urbanisation. It is completely flat, sunny, and surrounded by nature. There are trails in the surrounding area to walk up the mountain. Crossing to the other side of the road there is a path that leads to the Pallejà antenna, where you can enjoy the panoramic views of the region and Barcelona.

title: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 3 Carrer Granada
title_short: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 3 Carrer Granada
description: SHOWERS! For those who love lobre camping, here is a truck stop where you can take a shower! Simple but clean bathrooms with hot water. The location location is called CTW Parking Services, insert it into Google Maps for more accurate directions. Probably best if you have cash, not sure if they take the card. The showers are located in the area where all the trucks are parked, near the gas station. Bring your towel and toiletries.

title: (08206) Sabadell - 32 Avinguda d'Estrasburg
description: Wash Up Laundry

title: (08130) La Florida - 24 Carrer Nou
description: Small wasteland next to the train tracks. You can park. We have slept in the van.

title: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 4 Carrer Germans Carreras
title_short: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 4 Carrer Germans Carreras
description: Parking in the same train station, 15 minutes from Plaza Cataluña.

title: (08906) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 12 Avinguda de Manuel Azaña
title_short: (08906) L'Hospitalet de Llobregat - 12 Avinguda de Manuel Azaña
description: Near metro L5, direct to Sagrada Familia. to sleep another close after 21:00 to find a place

title: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 3 Carrer Vallès
title_short: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 3 Carrer Vallès
description: Newly opened laundry. Large esplanade nearby to park without problems.

title: (08223) Terrassa - 4-6 Carrer de Badalona
description: Parking day and night, without services, next to the sports complex, 3 places for large vehicles.

title: (08120) La Llagosta - 29 Carrer del Montseny
description:
24-hour car park
secured by CCTV
I asked the gentleman if I could sleep he said yes.
we are 100m from the train station for Barcelona.
clean and secure no other service

title: (08130) Santa Perpètua de Mogoda - 31 Avinguda de Mossèn Jacint Verdaguer
title_short: (08130) Santa Perpètua de Mogoda - 31 Avinguda de Mossèn Jacint Verdaguer
description: Correcan parking, next to Parc Central, artificial lake with Wake-board, playground, green areas, Condis supermarket, bars and restaurants. Disadvantage: next to the road, but quiet and safe. Parking online. Important to note that dogs can not enter the park, for that is the correcan. Let's keep the place clean

title: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 6 Carrer Garraf
title_short: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 6 Carrer Garraf
description: Huge parking lot of hard ground. To spend the night, ideal. Zero problems, zero noise.

title: (08207) Sabadell - 2 Carrer de la Segarra
description: Fabulous Self-Service Laundry with 12 and 16kg washers. And 18kg dryers. Ideal for washing and drying our clothes quickly. Highly recommended. Bars and supermarkets around to take advantage of the time.

title: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 5 Carrer de Torreblanca
title_short: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 5 Carrer de Torreblanca
description: Free parking. Wc inside a parquet with closing hours. I have slept several nights and during the day it is full of local people, but at night there is usually space. It's quiet. Freepark. WC inside during park hours. I had slept several times and is quite. During day time it is full. Not at night.

title: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 37 Avinguda Constitució
title_short: (08740) Sant Andreu de la Barca - 37 Avinguda Constitució
description: Asphalted and level esplanade where you can spend the night during the whole week except on Fridays, parking is prohibited from 5:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.

title: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 57 Carrer de Sant Josep
title_short: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 57 Carrer de Sant Josep
description: Place to park and spend the night Camper and AC, with many services around. Laundry, bars, bakery, vet and supermarket. On Monday mornings there is a street market that has access to the parking lot.

title: (08224) Terrassa - 52 N-150
description: Site away from the city with access by paved road, a few minutes from the center of Terrassa. Quiet place to rest. views of the city, but there is garbage on the ground

title: (08013) Barcelona - 183 Carrer de Nàpols
description: Amazing bar accompanied with a proper laundry service. The washing and drying works with tokens so you don’t have to bother with coins which is a huge extra.

title: (08013) Barcelona - 174 Carrer de Nàpols
description: Paid parking convenient for visiting Barcelona safely. there are guards around the clock. there are toilets at the back of the garage (we asked and we were able to use them). for the height I don't know but in a van it's ok !! I would say 2m30 max.

title: (08740) Barcelona -
description: Free parking day and night. Perfect for going on the metro into the city. There are no time restrictions. We slept for one night and left our van for a whole day to visit Barcelona. The area is safe and clean. There is parallel parking as well as parking bays. We were able to parallel park on the road. There is noise around 7am due to the rush hour but any other time is pretty quiet.

title: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 9 Carrer de Ramón i Cajal
title_short: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 9 Carrer de Ramón i Cajal
description: Laundry with plugs to charge devices and wifi!

title: (08202) Sabadell -
description: Ample parking in the middle of nature, adjacent to the Sanctuary of La Salut. It is next to a beautiful pine forest and next to the animal shelter.

title: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 13 Carrer de Josep Tarradellas
title_short: (08980) Sant Feliu de Llobregat - 13 Carrer de Josep Tarradellas
description: Avinguda 11 de setembre / Avinguda del sol. It is common to see AC's and campers parked on this street. Right at the main entrance of the FCB Joan Gamper sports city, during the day it is an area with a lot of traffic, especially during the week. If you are a FCB fan you will be able to see the players. You have an ALDI supermarket right there. About 500 meters away there is also a truck washing center called MUXU, they also wash AC's and bulky vehicles.

title: (08231) Ca n'Amat - 2 Avinguda Antoni Gaudí
description: View of the mountains in the distance + nature all around you, super easy access

title: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 55 Carrer de la TV3
title_short: (08970) Sant Joan Despí - 55 Carrer de la TV3
description: Calle de la tv3 free parking area in front of the other parking lot of the conatas building, this has no GALIBO problems and is free, many residents of the area park their campers and AC's there since it is a quiet area.

title: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - 67 Carrer de Balmes
title_short: (08930) Sant Adrià de Besòs - 67 Carrer de Balmes
description: Free day parking next to the metro entrance to visit the city

title: (08970) Sant Joan Despí -
description: Not free parking with height galibo, just behind the conatas office buildings, tv3 area, galibo beware of the height of the bridge !!! 2 min away is the municipal swimming pool of sant joan despí tv3 and the tennis courts, 5 minutes from the moises broggi hospital. Ideal to go with dogs, since you are parked in a great park. Just 30 meters away there is a drinking fountain, next to the orchards and joan perich school. Negative point. From time to time there are kids making a bottle, and during the week it is a green zone for residents of the area.

title: (08917) Badalona - 1 Avinguda de la Comunitat Europea
title_short: (08917) Badalona - 1 Avinguda de la Comunitat Europea
description: Campingaz refill bottles (901 and larger) and LPG bottles are sold here.
